title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' with Colin's Early NFL Week 1 Leans
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' with Colin's Early NFL Week 1 Leans
description:
Colin and The Action Network CCO Chad Millman discuss NFL Week 1 lines and if Colin is a 'Sharp or Square' with his early leans, including Cowboys/Bucs (4:00), Steelers/Bills (5:00), Jets/Panthers (7:00), Jags/Texans (8:00), Cards/Titans (10:00), Eagles/Falcons (13:00), Chargers/ WFT (14:00), Niners Lions (20:00), Seahawks/Colts (22:00), Bengals/Vikings (24:00), Dolphins/Patriots (27:00), Broncos/Giants (29:00), and Browns/Chiefs (32:00).

Subscribe NOW and make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
